allow: Bash(# Compare the RNC data blocks between the two ROMs # Block 2: International at 356690, Original at 358152, packed size 0x027d + 18 header dd if=""Sensible Soccer - International Edition \(Europe\) \(En,Fr,De,It\).md"" bs=1 skip=356690 count=655)
Bash(# Use r2 to search for strings and analyze the ROM structure r2 -q -c ''iz~team'' ""Sensible Soccer - International Edition \(Europe\) \(En,Fr,De,It\).md"")
Bash(# Search for all readable strings in the ROM r2 -q -c ''iz'' ""Sensible Soccer - International Edition \(Europe\) \(En,Fr,De,It\).md"")
Bash(# r2 needs Mega Drive arch - let''s try raw search for strings r2 -q -c ''/z 4'' ""Sensible Soccer - International Edition \(Europe\) \(En,Fr,De,It\).md"")
